title: Legit all my friends including me have had our most deaths from Yasuo in 2016
body: I think we all know what this means.

replies.body: That you and your friends are a bunch of silver noobs who possess no skill?
This is true. Silver is too nice :P

Jhin was the source of most of my deaths.

I have become ART!

You were at five upvotes.

I have fixed this travesty.
http://img01.deviantart.net/d486/i/2016/072/1/6/when_you_hit_your_fourth_shot_just_right_by_pailknight-d9uz10w.png
Similarly
Nice, I saw this when you replied 4 minutes ago.
Me too Jhin over played, power Creep.
Not powercreep; an renaissance of art has swept the rift.
LOL
Same
Every single person I've talked to has the most deaths from Yasuo.

Vayne was responsible for most of my deaths.

That said, I tend to camp Yasuo whenever he is picked on the enemy team.
That Yasuo is very popular and you will have to play against him frequently unless he is banned?
that u shouldnt play so aggresive? xD
I was surprised to see that he was my most deaths, i don't even have a problem with Yasuo, yet i still died 303 times to him when most of the season i was doing well VS him in matchups of any kind.
Lee sin for me

Interesting, I too have the most deaths from Yasuo and the most kills from him as well. All this tells me is that Yasuo was in far more of my games than any other champion. Doesn't mean that he is broken. He has fed me just as much as he has been fed by me.
Lee has always been in more games than Yasuo.

> [{quoted}](name=WoonStruck,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=dz5jpkjh,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-12-14T15:17:08.746+0000)
>
> Lee has always been in more games than Yasuo.

Perhaps more games in total but Yasuo being as popular as he is, some people will see him more than Lee. Some will see Lee more often. I just happen to be one of those that sees more Yasuos than Lees.

Most deaths from lucian, most wins vs lucian

#SupportLyfe
lucian killed me the most singed beat me the most
Nocturne beat me the most :'(

I have the most deaths from Lee Sin.

And also the most kills on Lee Sin

???

I guess I play against Lee too much. dat pickrate.
My most killed AND most killed by were both vayne lol :)
